revision.text:
Below is a list of Spontaneanation episodes.
== Episode List== * Ep. 1 - [[A Denny's Parking Lot]] * Ep. 2 - [[A Mechanic's Garage]] * Ep. 3 - [[A Secret Society]] * Ep. 4 - [[Savannah, Georgia]] * Ep. 5 - [[Mars Base 3]] * Ep. 6 - [[Dracula's Bedroom]] * Ep. 7 - [[A UFC Weigh-In]] * Ep. 8 - [[A Superyacht]] * Ep. 9 - [[The Annual Ghost Sex Convention]] * Ep. 10 - [[The Student Lounge at a Performing Arts High School]] * Ep. 11 - [[The Underwear Department at Macy's]] * Ep. 12 - [[The Waiting Room at an Oil Change Place]] * Ep. 13 - [[A Dental Convention in Scottsdale, Arizona (Live at Largo)]] * Ep. 14 - [[An Urban Spelunkers Meeting]] * Ep. 15 - [[A Snorkeling Excursion Ticket Kiosk]] * Ep. 16 - [[An Intergalactic Performing Arts School]] * Ep. 17 - [[Science Fair]] * Ep. 18 - [[A Theme Park Break Room]] * Ep. 19 - [[Malibu]] * Ep. 20 - [[Death Valley]] * Ep. 21 - [[A Top Chef Finale Afterparty]] * Ep. 22 - [[A Clown Cemetery]] * Ep. 23 - [[A Miami Record Store In 1967]] * Ep. 24 - [[Sport Club (Live at Largo)]] * Ep. 25 - [[10th Circle of Hell]] * Ep. 26 - [[Garden of Eden]] * Ep. 27 - [[Underneath the Eiffel Tower (Live at Largo)]] * Ep. 28 - [[One Hour Photo Shop]] * Ep. 29 - [[Backstage at the Rush Concert (Live at Largo)]] * Ep. 30 - [[Vent Haven Ventriloquist Museum]] * Ep. 31 - [[Wine Tasting]] * Ep. 32 - [[Storage Room In Back Of Hot Dog Stand]] * Ep. 33 - [[TV News Control Room]] * Ep. 34 - [[Parking Garage (Live at Largo)]] * Ep. 35 - [[The Moon Landing Taping 1969]] * Ep. 36 - [[A Dinner Theater]] * Ep. 37 - [[Saltwater Tuffy Shoppe (Live from LA Podfest)]] * Ep. 38 - [[Beautiful, Fancy Apartment in NYC]] * Ep. 39 - [[Freeport, Illinois]] * Ep. 40 - [[Inside a 40 Year-Old Woman’s Purse]] * Ep. 41 - [[Pet Store, Post Robbery]] * Ep. 42 - [[The First Class Cabin of An Aer Lingus 747 in The 1970s (Live at Largo)]] * Ep. 43 - [[Pediatrician Waiting Room]] * Ep. 44 - [[The One Beauty Parlor In A Small Town]] * Ep. 45 - [[Margaritaville]] * Ep. 46 - [[Kay Jewelers In A Mall]] * Ep. 47 - [[Pediatrician’s Office]] * Ep. 48 - [[Laundromat]] * Ep. 49 - [[Universal Studios Hollywood]] * Ep. 50 - [[Santa Fe Art Gallery]] * Ep. 51 - [[Tesla Charging Station (Live at Largo)]] * Ep. 52 - [[The Last Blockbuster Video Store]] * Ep. 53 - [[The Line For The Circular Saw In The Lumber Department at Home Depot]] * Ep. 54 - [[Inside That Salvador Dali Painting with The Melting Clocks]] * Ep. 55 - [[Land Rover]] * Ep. 56 - [[Los Feliz, Karen’s House, 1997]] * Ep. 57 - [[Houston’s Restaurant in Houston TX]] * Ep. 58 - [[Rented Cabin in The Mountains]] * Ep. 59 - [[Call Center Christmas Party (Live at Largo)]] * Ep. 60 - [[Storm Drain (Live at San Francisco Sketchfest)]] * Ep. 61 - [[A Suburban High School History Class on The First Day of Black History Month (Live at Largo)]] * Ep. 62 - [[IKEA in Narnia (Live from The Atlantic Ocean)]] * Ep. 63 - [[A Coffee Plantation in Bali (Live from SXSW)]] * Ep. 64 - [[Knott’s Scary Farm (Live at Largo)]] * Ep. 65 - [[Televangelist’s Studio]] * Ep. 66 - [[Hamilton on Broadway]] * Ep. 67 - [[A Comic Book Shop]] * Ep. 68 - [[Paris]] * Ep. 69 -[[Minnesota State Fair| Minnesota State Fair]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''A Denny's Parking Lot''' is the first episode of Spontaneanation. An episode of "love, suspense, and people who live in dumpsters".
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/a-dennys-parking-lot/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Busy Philipps]]. Her [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'what is your favourite thing to eat when you're feeling sad? (and if you don't feed your feelings like I do, why are you a robot?)'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Craig Cackowski]] * [[Matt Gourley]] * [[Janet Varney]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Mitch and Dolores]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''A Mechanic's Garage '''is the second episode of Spontaneanation. A improv story set in a mechanic’s garage, featuring a dance-off.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/a-mechanics-garage/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Michael McMillian]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'do you have a perpetual age in your head, that when you think of yourself, you think of yourself at that age? And if so, what is the age and why?'
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Shulie Cowen]] * [[Marc Evan Jackson]] * [[Mark McConville]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Al A Peterson]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''A Secret Society''' is the third episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/a-secret-society/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Jason Ritter]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'who was your hero growing up (fictional or otherwise), and if you could would you trade places with that hero?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Craig Cackowski]] * [[Amanda Lund]] * [[Chris Tallman]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Mitch and Dolores]] (two segments) * [[The Cockney Undergarments Sprite]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''Savannah, Georgia''' is the fourth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/savannah-georgia/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Melanie Lynskey]]. Her [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'what was the first time you experienced the emotion 'humiliation'?'
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Sarah Burns]] * [[Marc Evan Jackson]] * [[Janet Varney]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Ty Coons]] * [[Mitch and Dolores]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''Mars Base 3''' is the fifth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/mars-base-3/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Dave Foley]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'if someone asked you, when you were 13 years old, who are the 5 people you'd invite to a dinner party, who would you have said?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Mark Gagliardi]] * [[Marc Evan Jackson]] * [[Amanda Lund]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Al A Peterson]] * [[Clifford]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''Dracula's Bedroom''' is the sixth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/draculas-bedroom/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Maria Thayer]]. Her [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'where were you when you realised God was a wholly implausible lie?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Drew Massey]] * [[Colleen Smith]] * [[Victor Yerrid]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Frankie Valli]] * [[Mitch and Dolores]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''A UFC Weigh-In''' is the seventh episode of Spontaneanation. Will Crusher Emily, the Sausage Maker from the Cuyahoga, defeat Monster (not Demon) Brad?
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/a-ufc-weigh-in/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Kaitlin Olson]]. Her [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'what's your favourite invention?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Mark McConville]] * [[Chris Tallman]] * [[Jean Villepique]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[A Contraptionaire]] * [[Dracula]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''A Superyacht''' is the eighth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/a-superyacht/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Elizabeth Reaser]]. Her [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'what do you like most about yourself?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Craig Cackowski]] * [[Jessica Chaffin]] * [[Chris Tallman]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Al A Peterson]] * [[Mitch and Dolores]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''The Annual Ghost Sex Convention''' is the ninth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/the-annual-ghost-sex-convention/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Michael Sheen]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'what animal would you save from extinction if you could?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[James Bladon]] * [[Sarah Burns]] * [[Mark McConville]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Frankie Valli]] * [[Charles Dumpster]] * [[Mitch and Dolores]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

page.title: The Student Lounge at a Performing Arts High School

revision.text:
'''The Student Lounge at a Performing Arts High School''' is the tenth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/the-student-lounge-at-a-performing-arts-high-school/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Justin Kirk]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'what is the earliest memory you have of doing something cruel?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Sarah Burns]] * [[Matt Gourley]] * [[Chris Tallman]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[A Contraptionaire]] * [[Dracula]] * [[Mitch and Dolores]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''The Underwear Department at Macy's''' is the eleventh episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio Edit == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/the-underwear-department-at-macys/ earwolf].
== Interview Edit == The interview for this episode was with [[Aimee Mann]]. Her [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'what is the thing you desire that you are most ashamed of desiring?'.
== Guests/Improvisors Edit == * [[Ted Michaels]] * [[Michael Oosterom]] * [[Colleen Smith]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Myles Gooyduck]] * [[The sexy ghost of George Washington]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

page.title: The Waiting Room at an Oil Change Place

revision.text:
'''The Waiting Room at an Oil Change Place '''is the twelfth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/the-waiting-room-at-an-oil-change-place/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Open Mike Eagle]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'do you have social anxiety? And, if so, how does it manifest?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Janet Varney]] * [[Jean Villepique]] * [[Hal Lublin]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Dracula]] * [[Myles Gooyduck]] * [[Mitch and Dolores]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

page.title: A Dental Convention in Scottsdale, Arizona (Live at Largo)

revision.text:
'''A Dental Convention in Scottsdale, Arizona''' is the thirteenth episode of Spontaneanation. It was recorded live at [http://www.largo-la.com/ Largo at the Coronet].
This episode's improv story is set at a Dental Convention in Scottsdale, Arizona on the hottest day of the year.
== Audio == This episode Notescan be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/a-dental-convention-in-scottsdale-arizona-live-from-largo/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Colin Hanks]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'why did you choose that outfit today?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Craig Cackowski]] * [[Marc Evan Jackson]] * [[Janet Varney]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Frankie Valli]] * [[A Contraptionaire]] * [[Mitch and Dolores]]
== Notes == This is the first live episode, and the first episode where the interview guest participated in the improv. (Colin Hanks plays both Jeremy Piven and the aide who interrupts the speech to announce Jon Lovitz is waiting.)
When Marc Evan Jackson is introduced, Eban plays the theme to the Thrilling Adventure Hour segment "Sparks Nevada, Marshall on Mars". Eban wrote the song, and Jackson plays the titular Sparks Nevada. Jackson comments that it's a great song.[[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]] [[Category:Live Episodes]]

'''An Urban Spelunkers Meeting''' is the fourteenth episode of Spontaneanation. This episode's improv story was set in an urban spelunkers meeting in an abandoned subway station.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/an-urban-spelunkers-meeting/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[John Hodgman]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'did you ever name your car and, if not, what the hell is wrong with you?'. John Hodgman also featured in one of the advertisements for this episode.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Shulie Cowen]] * [[Colleen Smith]] * [[Chris Tallman]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[A Contraptionaire]] * [[Captain Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''A Snorkeling Excursion Ticket Kiosk''' is the fifteenth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/a-snorkeling-excursion-ticket-kiosk/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Jen Kirkman]]. Her [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'do you believe in ghosts? Where is your evidence?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Matt Gourley]] * [[Jean Villepique]] * [[Victor Yerrid]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == This episode did not feature any advertisement characters.[[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''An Intergalactic Performing Arts School''' is the sixteenth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/an-intergalactic-performing-arts-school/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Aaron Abrams]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'why would you never talk to your cousin again if you needed a reason?'
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[James Bladon]] * [[Matt Gourley]] * [[Mark McConville]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Captain Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger]] * [[Mitch and Dolores]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''Science Fair''' is the seventeenth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/science-fair/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Paget Brewster]]. Her [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'you win a contest that entitles you to draft a twenty-eighth amendment to the constitution (guaranteed to pass). The only stipulation is that it must be food-related. What is your amendment?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Maria Blasucci]] * [[Craig Cackowski]] * [[Amanda Lund]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Dracula]] * [[Charles Dumpster]] * [[Mitch and Dolores]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''A Theme Park Break Room''' is the eighteenth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/a-theme-park-break-room/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Raphael Bob-Waksberg]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'gun to your head: choose a reality competition show to come to your home'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Erinn Hayes]] * [[Marc Evan Jackson]] * [[Mark McConville]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Frankie Valli]] * [[A Contraptionaire]] * [[Mitch and Dolores]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''Malibu '''is the nineteenth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/malibu/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Lisa Hanawalt]]. Her [[Interview Questions|question]] was "madam, how do you sleep at night?".
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Maria Blasucci]] * [[Sarah Burns]] * [[Chris Tallman]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Dracula]] * [[Mitch and Dolores]]
== Notes == This is the first episode to feature recurring characters in the improv segment (Nick Nolte and Charles Dumpster). [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''Death Valley''' is the twentieth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/death-valley/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Scott Carter]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'when was the last time you felt furious?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Jessica Chaffin]] * [[Michael Oosterom]] * [[Colleen Smith]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == This episode did not feature any advertisement characters.[[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''A Top Chef Finale Afterparty''' is the twenty-first episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/a-top-chef-finale-afterparty/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Jonathan Coulton]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'what ridiculous formality do you slavishly observe?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Janet Varney]] * [[Hal Lublin]] * [[Annie Savage]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[A Contraptionaire]] * [[Hannibal Lecter]] * [[Mitch and Dolores]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''A Clown Cemetery''' s the twenty-second episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/a-clown-cemetery/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Bob Kerr]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'if you were forced to make a career change and your success was guaranteed, what would you do?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Shulie Cowen]] * [[Matt Gourley]] * [[Jean Villepique]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Cher]] * [[Mitch and Dolores]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''A Miami Record Store In 1967''' is the twenty-third episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/a-miami-record-store-in-1967/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Derek Waters]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'what was the last thing you've done that you consider brave?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Carla Cackowski]] * [[Marc Evan Jackson]] * [[Colleen Smith]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == *[[Mitch and Dolores]] *[[A Contraptionaire]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''Sport Club''' is the twenty-fourth episode of Spontaneanation. This episode was recorded live at Largo at the Coronet.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/sport-clublive-at-largo/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Kumail Nanjiani]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'when did you realise you weren't alone?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Steve Agee]] * [[Sarah Burns]] * [[Jean Villepique]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Charles Dumpster]] * [[A Contraptionaire]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]] [[Category:Live Episodes]]

'''10th Circle of Hell''' is the twenty-fifth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/10th-circle-of-hell/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Joshua Malina]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'if you could eat all the dessert and never have any ill-effects, but all you could eat is dessert, would you?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Jessica Chaffin]] * [[Chris Tallman]] * [[Hal Lublin]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == There were no advertisement characters featured in this episode.[[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''Garden of Eden''' is the twenty-sixth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/garden-of-eden/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Tymberlee Hill]]. Her [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'what's the worst advice you've ever received?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Janet Varney]] * [[Victor Yerrid]] * [[Colleen Smith]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Rob Scrats]] * [[Samuel Elliott]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

page.title: Underneath the Eiffel Tower (Live at Largo)

revision.text:
'''Underneath the Eiffel Tower''' is the twenty-seventh episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/underneath-the-eiffel-tower-live/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Scott Aukerman]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'you can use your rib to make another living thing, but not a human: what do you make?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Matt Gourley]] * [[Amanda Lund]] * [[Chris Tallman]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Mitch and Dolores]] * [[Hannibal Lecter]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]] [[Category:Live Episodes]]

'''One Hour Photo Shop''' is the twenty-eighth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/one-hour-photo-shop/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Andrea Savage]]. Her [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'what is your earliest memory?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Jessica Chaffin]] * [[Matt Gourley]] * [[Drew Massey]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Cher]] * [[Samuel Elliott]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

page.title: Backstage at the Rush Concert (Live at Largo)

revision.text:
'''Backstage at the Rush Concert '''is the twenty-ninth episode of Spontaneanation. It was recorded in front of a live audience at Largo at the Coronet.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/backstage-at-the-rush-concert-live-from-largo/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Thomas Lennon]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'if you could be invisible and go visit a current celebrity's home, who would it be?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Sarah Burns]] * [[Craig Cackowski]] * [[Marc Evan Jackson]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Samuel Elliott]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]] [[Category:Live Episodes]]

'''Vent Haven Ventriloquist Museum '''is the thirtieth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/vent-haven-ventriloquist-museum/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Laraine Newman]]. Her question was 'corn or flour?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Maria Blasucci]] * [[Marc Evan Jackson]] * [[Jeremy Carter]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Shimmy Joyns]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''Wine Tasting''' is the thirty-first episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/wine-tasting/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Bruce McCulloch]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'if days of the week had colours, what colour would each day be and why?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Janet Varney]] * [[Amanda Lund]] * [[Annie Savage]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == There were no advertisement characters featured in this episode.[[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''TV News Control Room '''is the thirty-third episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/tv-news-control-room/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Paul Scheer]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'you can switch bodies with one person for one day: who would that be and describe your one day as that person'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Erinn Hayes]] * [[Marc Evan Jackson]] * [[Hal Lublin]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Mitch and Dolores]] * [[Tommy Wiseau]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''Parking Garage''' is the thirty-fourth episode of Spontaneanation. It was recorded in front of a live audience at Largo at the Coronet on September 12th, 2015.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/parking-garage-live-from-largo/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Kristen Schaal]]. Her [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'what is one event that you would go back and change in your life?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Matt Gourley]] * [[Mark McConville]] * [[Jeremy Carter]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]] [[Category:Live Episodes]]

'''The Moon Landing Taping 1969 '''is the thirty-fifth episode of Spontaneanation. During this episode, the earwolf sound board shorted out, taking the sound effects board with it.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/the-moon-landing-taping-1969/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Natalie Morales]]. Her [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'what's one thing that everyone in the United States can agree on?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Bob Dassie]] * [[Rich Talarico]] * [[Craig Cackowski]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Rodger News]] * [[Santa]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''A Dinner Theater''' is the thirty-sixth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/a-dinner-theater/  earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Ben Garant]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'how do you want people to remember you after you die?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Annie Savage]] * [[Colleen Smith]] * [[Stephanie Courtney]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Samuel Elliott]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

page.title: Saltwater Tuffy Shoppe (Live from LA Podfest)

revision.text:
'''Saltwater Tuffy Shoppe''' is the thirty-seventh episode of Spontaneanation. It was recorded live at the 2015 [https://www.lapodfest.com/ LA Podfest].
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/saltwater-tuffy-shoppe-live/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Andy Daly]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'what's the worst fear you ever overcame, and how did you overcome it?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Matt Gourley]] * [[Craig Cackowski]] * [[Janet Varney]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Mack Weldon]] * [[Cher]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]] [[Category:Live Episodes]]

'''Beautiful, Fancy Apartment in NYC '''is the thirty-eighth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/beautiful-fancy-apartment-in-nyc/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Lauren Lapkus]]. Her [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'what's the dumbest thing that ever sent you to the emergency room?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Tim Batt]] * [[Guy Montgomery]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Mack Weldon]] * [[Jack Nicholson]] * [[Santa]] [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''Freeport, Illinois '''is the thirty-ninth episode of Spontaneanation.
== Audio == This episode can be heard via [http://www.earwolf.com/episode/freeport-illinois/ earwolf].
== Interview == The interview for this episode was with [[Ravi Patel]]. His [[Interview Questions|question]] was 'what is a trait of yours that other people compliment you on most often?'.
== Guests/Improvisors == * [[Janet Varney]] * [[Chris Tallman]] * [[Jean Villepique]]
== Advertisement Characters Featured == * [[Santa]] (two segments) [[Category:Spontaneanation Episodes]]

'''Inside a 40 Year-Old Woman’s Purse '''is the fortieth episode of Spontaneanation.
